mapper.select: SELECT WEEKLY_PLAN_ID, WEEKLY_REPORT_ID, SALES, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE FROM WEEKLY_PLAN WHERE WEEKLY_REPORT_ID = #{value} ORDER BY REG_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEEKLY_PLAN(weekly_plan_id, weekly_report_id, sales, reg_date) VALUES(WEEKLY_PLAN_SEQ.nextval, #{weekly_report_id}, #{sales}, #{reg_date})
